rooms.name: Open-plan Kitchen & Living Area
rooms.description: A spacious Mediterranean-themed living space integrating the kitchen with the living area. Features include natural stone countertops, terracotta tiles, and ample natural light from large windows along one wall.

rooms.name: Dedicated Home Office
rooms.description: A quiet workspace with soundproofing and ergonomic design inspired by Mediterranean aesthetics. Includes built-in storage solutions for work materials and a small seating area.

rooms.name: Central Courtyard
rooms.description: An open courtyard designed to be the heart of the home. Adheres to Vastu principles by aligning with cardinal directions. Features a fountain or garden space for relaxation and natural light distribution.

openings.name: Front Entrance
openings.description: A welcoming entryway designed with Mediterranean elements such as stone detailing and arches.

openings.name: Back Door
openings.description: Access to the central courtyard from the living area, enhancing connection with nature.
